CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this study we report on a new approach to improve PCE of OPVs by enhancing the interchain π-π interaction.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. OPVs (Organic Photovoltaics)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. OPVs (Organic Photovoltaics)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| OPVs |

Note that "PCE" is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency", which is a property of solar cells. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this study we report on a new approach to improve PCE of OPVs by enhancing the interchain π-π interaction.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. OPVs (Organic Photovoltaics)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

The entity "OPVs" (Organic Photovoltaics) is not a material property, but rather a class of materials. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this study we report on a new approach to improve PCE of OPVs by enhancing the interchain π-π interaction.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. OPVs (Organic Photovoltaics)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Property Value" column:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |

The table shows the following entity in the "Property Value" column:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

This entity refers to the efficiency of a material in converting sunlight into electrical energy, which is a property value that is relevant to the performance of organic photovoltaics (OPVs).
